item.title: Avoiding Pitfalls When Using Amazon DynamoDB Interface VPC Endpoints
item.description:
Amazon DynamoDB now supports AWS PrivateLink as of March 19, 2024. This feature allows you to securely access DynamoDB from your Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) without exposing your traffic to the public internet. However, unlike VPC endpoints for other AWS managed services, the AWS PrivateLink for Amazon DynamoDB does not support the Private DNS feature.
